name: Flow Meter
description: Accurate device designed to measure the flow rate of water and other liquids in pipelines. Essential for monitoring water usage and ensuring efficiency in industrial and domestic applications. Built with durable materials for long-lasting performance.

name: Pressure Gauge
description: Reliable device for monitoring and displaying pressure in RO systems and industrial pipelines. Designed to handle high pressure with accuracy. Provides easy readability for continuous operation.
features: Clear dial display for easy reading

name: Conductivity Transmitter
description: Advanced transmitter for monitoring conductivity levels to ensure water quality in RO plants and industrial systems. Provides continuous and precise measurement for optimal process control.

name: pH Transmitter
description: Accurate instrument that measures and transmits pH levels in water treatment systems. Ensures stable pH monitoring for industrial, laboratory, and municipal water systems.

name: Pressure Transmitter
description: Provides highly accurate pressure monitoring and signal transmission for RO plants, boilers, and industrial processes. Built for reliable performance even in harsh conditions.

name: Level Transmitter
description: Ensures precise liquid level measurement in tanks, reservoirs, and process systems. Designed for continuous operation and accurate data output in water treatment and chemical industries.

name: Level Switch
description: Reliable device that detects and controls liquid levels using a float or probe mechanism. Widely used in water treatment, chemical plants, and storage tanks for safety and automation.
features: Available in float and probe designs

name: Flow Transmitter
description: Measures and transmits flow rate data in pipelines with high accuracy. Suitable for continuous process monitoring in RO plants, chemical industries, and water treatment systems.
